page.description: The A5.XTAB_ENUM() method returns a carriage return-line feed separated list of all of the crosstab (XTAB) operations in the database.

prototypes.prototype: Operation_List as C = :A5.XTAB_ENUM( [ object_enum_flags as N ] )
Next_Operation as C = :A5.XTAB_ENUM( lastname as C )

argument.name: Operation_List
argument.description: Full filenames for the crosstab operations stored in the currently open table.

argument.name: Next_Operation
argument.description: The next operation of the type.

item.name: Null = Operation name, full path, and filename.
4 = Operation type, layout name, full path, and filename
8 = Quoted operation name, full path, and filename.
12 = Operation type, quoted operation name, full path, and filename formatted for tree control.

argument.name: lastname
argument.description: The quoted name of an operation.
